mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `t_party_vip_info` WHERE `state` = 1 OR `state` = 2 ORDER BY `state` ASC, `id` DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{pageSize}

SELECT securityUser.`id` FROM `t_party_security_user` AS securityUser, `t_party_vip_info` AS vipInfo, `t_party` AS party WHERE vipInfo.`party_id` = party.`id` AND party.`id` = securityUser.`party_id` AND vipInfo.`id` = #{id}
